captions.caption: When you copy-paste code from Stack Overflow, and it actually works!
Me debugging my own code like it's written in an ancient language.
Why does this only work when I don't need it to?
Me after fixing a bug that took three days... in one line.
When you finally hit 'Run' and there are no errors!
Code compiles? Time to push to production and hope for the best!
When your code runs, but you have no idea why.
Me explaining my bug to the rubber duck at 2 AM.
Fix one bug, create three new ones. Classic.
